decks.notes: The main concept of this Izzet Control deck is to use a combination of card draw, removal spells, and powerful creatures to control the game and outvalue the opponent. With a focus on generating card advantage through spells like Accumulate Wisdom and Artist's Talent, as well as disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Abandon Attachments and Boomerang Basics, the deck aims to stay ahead in the resource game. Additionally, powerful finishers like Ral, Crackling Wit and Iroh's Demonstration can close out the game once the opponent has been sufficiently controlled.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly build up a board presence with efficient creatures and use cards like Earthbender Ascension and Esper Origins to enhance their abilities. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and combat tricks. Fabled Passage and Hushwood Verge help fix the mana base, while Escape Tunnel provides additional evasion for the creatures. The inclusion of Ba Sing Se and Royal Treatment gives the deck some added versatility and potential for card advantage. Ultimately, this deck is focused on aggressive Selesnya creatures and efficient combat interactions.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on maintaining board control and tempo, utilizing cards like Floodpits Drowner and Spyglass Siren to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also includes cards like Cecil, Dark Knight and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares to apply pressure and close out games quickly. The deck includes a mix of removal spells like Heartless Act and Tragic Trajectory to deal with threats while also having tools like Enduring Curiosity and Multiversal Passage to help maintain card advantage and ensure consistency in drawing key pieces.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence with low-cost creatures like Llanowar Elves and Sazh's Chocobo, and then utilize cards like Mossborn Hydra and Mightform Harmonizer to quickly pump up their power and overwhelm the opponent. Ba Sing Se and Earthbender Ascension can provide additional support and protection for your creatures, while cards like Fabled Passage and Escape Tunnel help with mana fixing and maintaining card advantage. Overall, this deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain board control to achieve a swift victory.

The deck focuses on using aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to control the board and apply pressure to the opponent. It combines creature synergy with removal and countermagic to maintain tempo and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By deploying threats quickly and efficiently, while also being able to deal with the opponent's threats, the deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent to secure victory. With a mix of aggression and control elements, the deck offers a versatile and dynamic gameplay experience.

The main idea behind this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using efficient creatures like Badgermole Cub and Ouroboroid. The deck also focuses on mana ramp with Llanowar Elves and Multiversal Passage to quickly play big threats like Sentinel of the Nameless City and Demon Wall. Control elements like Shoot the Sheriff and Duress help disrupt the opponent's game plan, while cards like Bitter Triumph and Maelstrom Pulse provide removal and board control. The deck also includes some card draw and recursion with Keen-Eyed Curator and Restless Cottage to maintain pressure on the opponent.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on efficient creatures and disruption to overwhelm opponents. By utilizing cards like Sentinel of the Nameless City and Demon Wall to apply pressure, along with removal spells like Tragic Trajectory and Maelstrom Pulse, the deck aims to control the board while dealing consistent damage. Llanowar Elves and Multiversal Passage provide mana acceleration, allowing for explosive plays. With a mix of high-value threats and disruption, the deck aims to quickly close out games before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on aggressively building up a board presence and overwhelming the opponent with a combination of creatures and combat tricks. It aims to ramp up mana quickly with cards like Llanowar Elves and Fabled Passage, while using cards like Mightform Harmonizer and Earthbender Ascension to boost the strength of its creatures. Escape Tunnel and Get Lost provide removal options, while cards like Hushwood Verge and Shared Roots help to ensure a steady flow of creatures onto the battlefield. Overall, the deck aims to flood the board and pressure the opponent into submission.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with a combination of aggressive creatures and burn spells. By utilizing cards like Burst Lightning and Burnout Bashtronaut, the deck aims to deal damage directly to the opponent's life total while maintaining board presence with creatures like Hired Claw and Razorkin Needlehead. The deck also utilizes Multiversal Passage and Floodpits Drowner to control the board and protect its aggro strategy. Overall, the key strategy is to apply relentless pressure and force the opponent to react defensively.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By utilizing cards like Patchwork Beastie and Wildfire Wickerfolk, the deck aims to deal damage efficiently and effectively before the opponent can stabilize. Multiversal Passage and Thornspire Verge help ensure consistent mana production, while cards like Burst Lightning and Violent Urge provide additional reach to finish off the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Overprotect and Fear of Missing Out to protect its creatures and maintain pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on using a combination of burn spells, counter magic, and aggressive creatures to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The key strategy is to control the board early with efficient removal spells like Abrade and Torch the Tower, while building up a board presence with creatures like Quantum Riddler and Riverpyre Verge. By maintaining pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan, this deck aims to close out the game before the opponent can stabilize. Additionally, cards like Ral, Crackling Wit can provide card advantage and additional reach for closing out games.

This deck focuses on quickly building up your board presence with mana ramp cards like Llanowar Elves and Fabled Passage, while also utilizing powerful creatures like Colossal Rattlewurm and Lumbering Worldwagon to apply pressure to your opponent. The inclusion of cards like Hushwood Verge and Esper Origins helps to maintain card advantage and ensure you have the resources needed to keep up the aggression. With a mix of efficient creatures and support spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a fast victory through a combination of efficient mana usage and powerful combat abilities.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and card draw. By using cards like Abandon Attachments, Spell Pierce, and Firebending Lesson, the player can disrupt their opponent's strategy while building up their own resources. The inclusion of Iroh's Demonstration and Ral, Crackling Wit provides additional card advantage and versatility. The mana base is designed to ensure consistent access to all colors needed for the deck's spells. Overall, the strategy revolves around outlasting the opponent and overpowering them with powerful spells.

The main idea of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures while also utilizing mana ramp and resource generation. Focused on utilizing the power of Selesnya cards to create a strong board presence, the deck includes cards like Llanowar Elves for ramp, Badgermole Cub and Hushwood Verge for aggressive creatures, and Earthbender Ascension for additional benefits. With a combination of creatures, mana ramp, and resource generation, this deck aims to quickly build a threatening board and apply pressure to the opponent.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggression and fast-paced plays. By utilizing cards like Earthbender Ascension, Lumbering Worldwagon, and Mightform Harmonizer, the deck aims to quickly build a formidable board presence and apply pressure. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Fabled Passage and Hushwood Verge to ensure consistent mana production, allowing for a smooth curve of powerful creatures and spells. The inclusion of cards like Felidar Retreat and Badgermole Cub adds further synergies and ways to boost the effectiveness of the deck's creatures.

This Jeskai Control deck focuses on manipulating the board state and gaining card advantage through a variety of spells and enchantments. It aims to control the game by utilizing removal spells like Abrade and Lightning Helix, as well as board wipes like Day of Judgment. Consult the Star Charts and Meticulous Archive help dig for key cards, while Rest in Peace disrupts graveyard strategies. The deck also includes various utility lands like Floodfarm Verge and Riverpyre Verge to ensure consistent mana sources. Ultimately, the goal is to outlast opponents and overpower them with powerful late-game threats like Ultima and Wan Shi Tong, Librarian.
